metadata.title: CVE-2023-38887 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: File Upload vulnerability in Dolibarr ERP CRM v.17.0.1 and before allows aremote attacker to execute arbitrary code and obtain sensitive informationvia the extension filtering and renaming functions.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
